Description: AWS CloudFormation template to create an AD Connector and associated resources for directory service.

ADServiceAccountUsername.Description: The username for the service account on the on-premises AD.

ADServiceAccountPassword.Description: The password for the service account on the on-premises AD.

DirectoryDNSIpAddresses.Description: Comma-separated list of IP addresses for the directory DNS servers.

DirectoryName.Description: The fully qualified name of the on-premises domain.

VPCId.Description: VPC Id where the resources will be deployed.

SubnetIds.Description: Comma-separated list of subnet ids where the AD Connector will be deployed.

CreateSeamlessDomainJoinResources.Description: Specify 'Yes' to create resources for seamless domain join for both Windows & Linux EC2 instances.

CreateDomainMembersSecurityGroup.Description: Specify 'Yes' to create a Security Group for domain members that allows all PrivateIP communications inbound.

CreateDHCPOptionsSet.Description: Specify 'Yes' to create a DHCP options set pointing to the Domain DNS servers.

Properties.GroupDescription: Allow all inbound traffic on private IPs within VPC
